desc_content.paragraph: Freehand annotation sketchbook
Base color for ghosts after the active frame

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, 1], default (0.12549, 0.082353, 0.529412)

desc_content.paragraph: Animation data for this data-block
Base color for ghosts before the active frame

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, 1], default (0.145098, 0.419608, 0.137255)

desc_content.paragraph: Color for editing line

field_body.paragraph: float array of 4 items in [0, 1], default (0.6, 0.6, 0.6, 0.5)

desc_content.paragraph: Maximum number of frames to show after current frame (0 = don’t show any frames after current)
Maximum number of frames to show before current frame (0 = don’t show any frames before current)
Draw Grease Pencil strokes on click/drag
Sculpt Grease Pencil strokes instead of viewport data
Grease Pencil weight paint
Change fade opacity of displayed onion frames
Mode to display frames

list_item.paragraph: ABSOLUTE Frames, Frames in absolute range of scene frame number.
RELATIVE Keyframes, Frames in relative range of grease pencil keyframes.

desc_content.paragraph: Scale conversion factor for pixel size (use larger values for thicker lines)
Maintain the thickness of the stroke when the viewport zoom changes
Show stroke drawing direction with a bigger green dot (start) and smaller red dot (end) points
Force recalc of fill data after use deformation modifiers (reduce FPS)
Use custom colors for ghost frames
Ghosts are shown in renders and animation playback. Useful for special effects (e.g. motion blur)
Edit strokes from multiple grease pencil keyframes at the same time (keyframes must be selected to be included)
Display onion keyframes with a fade in color transparency
Display first onion keyframes using next frame color to show indication of loop start frame
Show ghosts of the frames before and after the current frame
Edit Grease Pencil strokes instead of viewport data

list_item.paragraph: FRONT Front, Draw all strokes in front.
3DSPACE 3DSpace, Draw strokes relative to other objects in 3D space.
BACK Back, Draw all strokes on back.

desc_content.paragraph: Remove all the grease pencil data

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
